entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is described as someone who is huddled in one of Fleur's coats and is crouched down to place her fingers on the elf's eyelids. She is also referred to as 'she' throughout the passage.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is mentioned as someone who owns a coat that Luna is huddled in.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is described as an elf who has been placed in the grave by Harry. He is also referred to as 'the dead elf' and 'he'.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who places Dobby's body into the grave and arranges his limbs so that he might have been resting.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone whose funeral Harry remembered. He is also referred to as 'the Minister of Magic' in the front row.

relationships.description: Luna thanks Dobby for rescuing her from something, but it is not specified what that something is.
Harry places Dobby's body into the grave and arranges his limbs so that he might have been resting.
